name: F. O. O. D.
description:
Designed and developed over 3 weeks for a university game jam class

~~~

Ahoy, Gumdrop Pirates!

F.O.O.D's mission is simple: no hangry pirates, only happy pirates. We are a delivery ship that serves food to starving pirates on faraway islands. 

Speedy, efficient, we are F.O.O.D.

Controls

Press and hold Space to move

Use mouse in menu

Credits

Owen Hellum: Programmer, Scene Assembly

Sharon Ku: UI & UX Designer, Illustrator

Alex Lorrain: 3D Modeller, Map Designer, Sound Effects

Sounds

Pixabay

Seagull sound effect

~~~
